title: Old video from South Africa resurfaces with FAKE claim related to COVID-19 | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the outbreak of the Coronavirus, a video is being shared on social media which shows a hostage situation at an airport. It is being claimed that the video is from China following the outburst of COVID-19.

ALSO READ: Did President Putin announce five years jail for those not in…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found that the claim attached to the video is FAKE.

On breaking the video into several keyframes and putting them through Reverse Image Search, we came across the same video in a news bulletin on YouTube dated November 28, 2019, by Dakaractu TV.

According to the title and description of the video which was in French, it was established that the above video is of a mock drill that took place at an airport in Senegal, South Africa on November 28, 2019.

Hence, the above information proves that the viral video is NOT from China and it has no connection with the deadly Coronavirus.
